tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT FUNNEL(useraction.name="${entity.key_user_action.1.name}" AS "${entity.key_user_action.1.name}", useraction.name="${entity.key_user_action.2.name}" AS "${entity.key_user_action.2.name}", useraction.name="${entity.key_user_action.3.name}" AS "${entity.key_user_action.3.name}", useraction.name="${entity.key_user_action.4.name}" AS "${entity.key_user_action.4.name}") FROM usersession WHERE useraction.application = "${entity.mobile_application.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(duration) AS "Avg Response Time" FROM useraction WHERE name = "${entity.key_user_action.1.name}" AND application = "${entity.mobile_application.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(duration) AS "Avg Response Time" FROM useraction WHERE name = "${entity.key_user_action.2.name}" AND application = "${entity.mobile_application.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(duration) AS "Avg Response Time" FROM useraction WHERE name = "${entity.key_user_action.3.name}" AND application = "${entity.mobile_application.name}"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT AVG(duration) AS "Avg Response Time" FROM useraction WHERE name = "${entity.key_user_action.4.name}" AND application = "${entity.mobile_application.name}"
